Returns: no returns description in source Value is 1 or greater.
value().Description: The API level to require. Alias for @B_android#support#annotation#RequiresApi#api_E@ which allows you to leave out the api= part.

Returns: no returns description in source Value is 1 or greater.

ClassDesc: Denotes that the annotated element should only be called on the given API level or higher. This is similar in purpose to the older @TargetApi annotation, but more clearly expresses that this is a requirement on the caller, rather than being used to "suppress" warnings within the method that exceed the minSdkVersion.
